metas.name: Arrested Development
metas.description: Similar absurdist humor and ensemble cast as shows like 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Scrubs'.

metas.name: Community
metas.description: Smart, meta-humor with a focus on character relationships like 'Scrubs' and 'Ted Lasso'.

metas.name: Parks and Recreation
metas.description: Optimistic and heartwarming humor similar to 'Ted Lasso', with a great ensemble cast.

metas.name: The Good Place
metas.description: Philosophical comedy with surprising twists, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and shows with strong writing.

metas.name: What We Do in the Shadows
metas.description: Deadpan humor and absurd situations reminiscent of 'It's Always Sunny' and 'Brassic', but with vampires.

metas.name: Peep Show
metas.description: Dark and awkward British humor, similar to 'Brassic' but with a unique point-of-view style.

metas.name: Black Books
metas.description: Cranky, bookstore owner humor, great British comedy like Goodness Gracious Me.

metas.name: Toast of London
metas.description: Absurdist British comedy featuring a struggling actor, likely to appeal to fans of British humor and quirky characters.

metas.name: The IT Crowd
metas.description: Classic British workplace comedy with a geeky focus, similar humor to Goodness Gracious Me.

metas.name: Spaced
metas.description: Cult British sitcom with fast-paced humor and pop culture references, like 'Rick and Morty' and 'The Simpsons'.

metas.name: Maniac
metas.description: Mind-bending sci-fi with dark humor and strong performances, appealing to fans of 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Dark
metas.description: Complex and mysterious sci-fi thriller with time travel, appealing to fans of 'Stranger Things' and 'Foundation'.

metas.name: Severance
metas.description: Dystopian sci-fi with a strong mystery element and thought-provoking themes, like 'Fallout' and 'Stranger Things'.

metas.name: Westworld
metas.description: Ambitious sci-fi with philosophical themes and action, appealing to fans of 'Foundation' and 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Black Mirror
metas.description: Anthology series exploring dark and thought-provoking themes related to technology, like 'Love, Death & Robots' and 'Fallout'.

metas.name: Counterpart
metas.description: Spy thriller with a sci-fi twist involving parallel universes, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and shows with complex plots.

metas.name: Mr. Robot
metas.description: Dark and suspenseful thriller with a focus on hacking and mental health, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Mindhunter
metas.description: Crime drama focused on the early days of criminal profiling, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Fargo
metas.description: Anthology crime drama with dark humor and memorable characters, appealing to fans of 'Brassic' and shows with strong writing.

metas.name: Ozark
metas.description: Dark and suspenseful crime drama about a family involved in money laundering, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'Brassic'.

metas.name: Sherlock
metas.description: Modern take on the classic detective stories, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and shows with strong mystery elements.

metas.name: Luther
metas.description: Dark and intense crime drama with a brilliant but troubled detective, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and 'All Her Fault'.

metas.name: Line of Duty
metas.description: British police procedural focusing on corruption within the police force, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and crime dramas.

metas.name: Bodyguard
metas.description: Intense political thriller with plenty of suspense, appealing to fans of 'The Night Manager' and shows with strong action elements.

metas.name: Dirk Gently's Holistic Detective Agency
metas.description: Quirky and absurd detective series with sci-fi elements, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and shows with unusual plots.

metas.name: Ash vs Evil Dead
metas.description: Campy horror-comedy with plenty of gore and humor, appealing to fans of 'Rick and Morty' and shows with dark humor.

metas.name: Upload
metas.description: Comedy sci-fi where people can upload themselves into a virtual afterlife, appealing to fans of 'Ted Lasso' and the concept of 'Love, Death & Robots'.

metas.name: Extraordinary
metas.description: A comedy where everyone gets a superpower except for Jen, who feels left out.

metas.name: Final Space
metas.description: Animated sci-fi comedy-drama with a great story arc and plenty of heart.

metas.name: Invincible
metas.description: Superhero animation that is both brutal and has moments of great story telling. It would appeal to fans of One-Punch Man.

metas.name: The Boys
metas.description: A dark comedic take on Superheros, and the companies that own them.

metas.name: Marvel's Agent Carter
metas.description: Action adventure with mystery elements that would appeal to fans of action TV shows.

metas.name: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
metas.description: A detective show but comedy show that would appeal to fans of Scrubs and other comedies.

metas.name: Avenue 5
metas.description: A tour through the solar system goes sideways and the people on board must learn to survive together.

metas.name: Disenchantment
metas.description: A princess who drinks and doesn't want to be a typical princess.

metas.name: Reboot
metas.description: Hulu brings back the cast of an old 90's comedy to film a show again, but this time, its more dramatic.

metas.name: Mythic Quest
metas.description: A comedy about people who work at a video game company.

metas.name: Resident Alien
metas.description: A show about an alien who takes the form of a doctor and hides out in a mountain town.

metas.name: Peacemaker
metas.description: Dark humor with lots of action.

metas.name: Barry
metas.description: Dark comedy about a hitman trying to become an actor.
